text: Former ` ` Bachelorette'' star JoJo Fletcher. ABC In the world of reality dating shows, talking about your past relationships and sex life is par for the course, but few would think that extended to the show's producers. Yet that's exactly what a former segment producer for ` ` The Bachelor'' claims happened to her in a new complaint against Warner Bros., which produces the show. Becky Steenhoek — who worked on the production for the 2016 season of ` ` The Bachelorette'' with JoJo Fletcher — filed a lawsuit on Monday in the Los Angeles Superior Court and spoke with the Los Angeles Times about what occurred between her and five other producers, who were also named along with Warner Bros. in the complaint.
